XMVP.Story: { "title": "Definitely Not Dragons: A Logical Fallacy", "synopsis": "When a self-proclaimed 'Dragon Slayer' discovers the dragons are just performance artists adhering to a strict, albeit bizarre, contract, he's forced to confront the absurdity of his life's purpose and the futility of seeking meaning in a fundamentally illogical world.", "characters": [ "Bartholomew 'Barty' Buttersworth (The Dragon Slayer)", "Agnes Periwinkle (Dragon Union Representative)", "Reginald 'Reggie' Scales (Lead Dragon/Method Actor)", "Professor Quentin Quibble (Existentialist Philosopher/Barty's reluctant guide)", "Brenda Bumble (Town Gossip/Narrator)", "Mayor Mildred McMillan (Pragmatic, exasperated mayor)", "Cecil Chumley (Barty's overly enthusiastic sidekick)" ], "theme": "Hero's Journey" }
XMVP.Meta: { "source_file": "Ex_Nihilo_Project", "hj24_map": true, "parody": true, "genesis_mode": true, "atu_theme": "ATU 300: The Dragon Slayer", "tlp_axiom": "The tautology has no truth-conditions, for it is uncondition-\nally true; and the contradiction is on no condition true." }
